title: [Yegharren Valley, Ravine]
description: A lone tree protrudes from a ledge some distance above, its twisted form, grown from a fallen seed many years ago, casting an uneven shadow over the ravine.  A huge pile of fallen rocks blocks the ravine to the west, its sharp and unstable edges forming a treacherous obstacle.

A lone tree protrudes from a ledge some distance above, its twisted form, grown from a fallen seed many years ago, casting a ghostly shadow in the moonlight.  A huge pile of fallen rocks blocks the ravine to the west, its sharp and unstable edges forming a treacherous obstacle.
